Join George Galloway on the new home for the Mother of All Talk Shows - this week we talk all about coronavirus, riots in the US, US elections, and the state of UK economy
When electoral politics fails us, we will make our demands elsewhere. This is the moment in which we find ourselves.
On this episode of The Critical Hour, Dr. Wilmer Leon is joined by Caleb Maupin, journalist and political analyst who focuses his coverage on US foreign policy.
NYPD kettle, brutalize, arrest protesters & medics; Richmond removing Robert E. Lee statue; Minneapolis pulling police from schools

Beauty of Earthly Landscapes Which Can Only Be Seen From Above
This Week in Pictures: 30 May - 5 June
PPSh-41: The Legendary Machine Gun That Helped Win WWII
Fence Fixation
Tear Jerk

A little-known US-based firm has managed to mislead the world's governments and health officials, bringing worldwide hydroxychloroquine studies to a temporary halt, say data scientist Mostapha Benhenda and epidemiologist Dr. Jeremy Howick, wondering how prestigious scientific journals could have been duped.

The George Floyd demonstrations quickly turned from peaceful protests to violent riots engulfing more than 140 cities amid a coronavirus-related recession and sharp spike in unemployment in the US. American clinical psychologist Erlanger Turner has explained what feeds the people's frustration and outrage.

Joe Biden is scoring political points in important swing states, as an election handicapper has recently found. American political scientists have discussed how the ex-vice president's performance in 13 key states may influence the November election and what impact the COVID crisis and George Floyd protests could have on the US political landscape.

New Delhi (Sputnik): After a month-long stand-off in India's eastern Ladakh region and several rounds of failed diplomatic talks to ease the border tension, the Indian and Chinese military will hold a high-level meeting on June 6. The current stand-off over the expedited infrastructure development along the LAC is the longest-lasting since 2017.

Millions of people are being purged from US voter roles in swing states in violation of the law. They are disproportionately young, poor, or from ethnic minority backgrounds - people who would generally not vote for the Republican Party - award-winning journalist Greg Palast tells Sputnik.

A combination of military and media pressure has resulted in the termination of Iraq war related criminal investigations, reflecting the power of the British military as "the only institution in the UK that is allowed to run their own criminal courts and prosecution service", according to the Peace Pledge Union.

When electoral politics fails us, we will make our demands elsewhere. This is the moment in which we find ourselves.
On this episode of The Critical Hour, Dr. Wilmer Leon is joined by Caleb Maupin, journalist and political analyst who focuses his coverage on US foreign policy.
NYPD kettle, brutalize, arrest protesters & medics; Richmond removing Robert E. Lee statue; Minneapolis pulling police from schools

This Week in Pictures: 30 May - 5 June
PPSh-41: The Legendary Machine Gun That Helped Win WWII
Fence Fixation
Tear Jerk

A little-known US-based firm has managed to mislead the world's governments and health officials, bringing worldwide hydroxychloroquine studies to a temporary halt, say data scientist Mostapha Benhenda and epidemiologist Dr. Jeremy Howick, wondering how prestigious scientific journals could have been duped.

The George Floyd demonstrations quickly turned from peaceful protests to violent riots engulfing more than 140 cities amid a coronavirus-related recession and sharp spike in unemployment in the US. American clinical psychologist Erlanger Turner has explained what feeds the people's frustration and outrage.

Joe Biden is scoring political points in important swing states, as an election handicapper has recently found. American political scientists have discussed how the ex-vice president's performance in 13 key states may influence the November election and what impact the COVID crisis and George Floyd protests could have on the US political landscape.

New Delhi (Sputnik): After a month-long stand-off in India's eastern Ladakh region and several rounds of failed diplomatic talks to ease the border tension, the Indian and Chinese military will hold a high-level meeting on June 6. The current stand-off over the expedited infrastructure development along the LAC is the longest-lasting since 2017.

Millions of people are being purged from US voter roles in swing states in violation of the law. They are disproportionately young, poor, or from ethnic minority backgrounds - people who would generally not vote for the Republican Party - award-winning journalist Greg Palast tells Sputnik.

A combination of military and media pressure has resulted in the termination of Iraq war related criminal investigations, reflecting the power of the British military as "the only institution in the UK that is allowed to run their own criminal courts and prosecution service", according to the Peace Pledge Union.
